about_the_game:
Halloween is a magical time when your fears become reality.🎃
Everyone is much more likely to look around these days.



We have prepared for you five mystical Halloween stories from which you will get an unforgettable pleasure. Realize your secret fantasies with witches, werewolves, aliens and other characters.



In the game you will find:

  • Spicy scenes
  • Catching plot with hot girls
  • Spooky atmosphere
  • Juicy and bright animations



Spend unforgettable Halloween holidays in Halloween Naughty Girls.



The night before Halloween
Rachel loves parties and hanging out with friends. Unfortunately, she is forced to stay alone in the huge house at night before All Hallows Eve. Or maybe not alone? This is what you have to find out.

The sudden invasion
Dorothy has lived in the countryside all her life and prefers calm nature to the noisy city. She is cheerful, curious and open-minded. Maybe that's why the aliens chose her?

The witchy hour
Kurt is an ordinary employee in a large corporation. He spends all evenings in a bar to brighten up his boring life. One such evening he meets a charming and mystical girl who changes him forever.

The shadow into the woods
Page and Neil are typical young couple. Neil is a promising football player, and Paige is a cheerleader on his team. One day they come to the forest to have a romantic date. But what could go wrong?

The full moon of love
Max agreed to pick up Sara after the Halloween party, but the girl refused to end the fun and go home. Then the guy decided to take the chance to get closer to her and tell her about his main secret. Will she like the new information about her friend or not?

Mini-Games:

Naked Mod


Puzzles

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains images of sex and strong language. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Halloween Naughty Girls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Halloween Naughty Girls is a collection of adult visual novels inspired by classic horror movies from the 80s and 90s.
